Poets, Prophets and Revolutionaries: The Literary Avant-Garde from Rimbaud Through Postmodernism, New York and Oxford: Oxford University Press. Modernism’s Last Post’
A lucid analysis of the differences between postmodernism and postcolonialism, arguing the latter’s need to retain modernist foundations for strategic political reasons
